content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li

content: Hello! Thank you for considering me for the rental of your apartment. Could you please let me know the rental price you are proposing?
name: Bo Li

content: The rental price is 800 Euro per month. Would you agree to this price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would like to negotiate further to see if we can come to an agreement on a lower rental price. Is there any flexibility in your budget to allow for a lower price?
name: Bo Li

content:
I am willing to offer 750 Euro per month, but that is the best I can do. Are you willing to accept this price?

If not, could you please let me know your counteroffer?

Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for your counteroffer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am willing to accept the rental price of 750 Euro per month. I agree to this price. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation in this matter.
name: Bo Li
